p: 3T3-L1 preadipocyte cells were purchased from the cell bank of Rio de Janeiro, RJ, Brazil (CR089-BCRJ/UFRJ), and maintained with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS)/DMEM containing 4.5 g/L glucose, 100 U/mL penicillin, 0.1 mg/mL streptomycin, and 0.25 mg/mL amphotericin B at 37 Â°C in 5% CO 2 incubator.
